description.value: A Creature of the warp. Double Toughness Bonus against all damage that is not as a result of Force Weapons, Psychic Powers, Holy Attacks, or other Daemonic Creatures. Also Immune to Poison and Disease. Note: Doubled Toughness Bonus from Daemonic and Unnatural Toughness (xY) are independant, a creature with both traits effectively has TBx(Y+1), not TBxYx2.
